law.catch_line: On determination of the presence of sickle cell anemia, the Department shall:...

text.section:
On determination of the presence of sickle cell anemia, the Department shall:
Notify in writing:
The physician of record or the institution at which the child is born; and
The parents or guardian of the infant;
Provide the parents or guardian of the infant and the physician of record with educational materials; and
Offer referral for genetic counseling.
Within 2 months after a positive finding of sickle cell anemia, a confirmatory test shall be administered and the results of this test shall be reported to the Department.
